channel.title: Auto-Restart
channel.description:
Ok well on my computer the auto-restarter works fine but when my hoster tries to use it it doesn't work it pops up saying Cannot find runserver.bat
The only 2 difference's idk if they make a difference is he is running on XP Service pack 3 and i'm running on service pack 2 and he has kapersky would these effect it?

item.title: Auto-Restart
item.dc:creator: @Goth_Wolf Goth Wolf
item.description:
@Goth_Wolf wrote:

Auto restarter that i using is a .exe

Read full topic

item.title: Auto-Restart
item.dc:creator: @boypipo boypipo
item.description:
@boypipo wrote:

try making sure the jdk 6.0_06 or w.e is set to yours.
that happend to me because i didnt know the auto restarter had a jdk

Read full topic
